Name: Intergalactic Bubbles
About the game: Blast your way through space in this innovative 3D bubble puzzler! Bounce, bobble, swing, and explode bubbles across the universe. Intergalactic Bubbles advances the classic match-3 genre into the 21st century with stellar graphics, 3D action, and upgrades. 'It's a great game!' - James Bartholomeou, Initiative Check Sectors full of levels provide hours of bubble blasting challenges. Upgrade your abilities to enhance your play style. Use power bubbles alone or combine them to unleash devastation!
